CheckTitle: Checks if SageMaker notebook instances have a KMS key configured. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a SageMaker notebook instance does not have a KMS key configured.
Description: Checks if SageMaker notebook instances have a KMS key configured. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a SageMaker notebook instance does not have a KMS key configured.
Risk: If SageMaker notebook instances do not have a KMS key configured, the data at rest is not encrypted using customer-managed keys, increasing the risk of unauthorized access.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that SageMaker notebook instances have a KMS key configured.
